website_summaries.verdict: An impressive 14-inch high RV step made from very hard-wearing and sturdy plastic, which makes this lightweight and easy to transport.
pros: Can also be used around the home for hard to reach places
Hardcore plastic construction is sturdy but lightweight and very portable with carry handle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to assist my older German Shepard with getting in and out of the cab of my 4-wheel drive pickup. This step is super easy to use and doesn't weigh as much as the ramp I purchased. There is no set-up and it isn't awkward to use. It stores perfectly in either the cab or the bed of my pickup. And since I'm a bit height challenged, it also helps me get into the bed of my pickup. I would definitely recommend this step to others and would buy it again if I have another need for this two-step
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my small camper
customer_reviews.text: I love these steps. My 21' Rockwood Mini Lite only has one narrow pull out step and short handrail and I needed something to give a bit more stepping room when coming out of the camper. I put the camper step in and put this one up to the entry way. It worked out perfectly and is much safer going in and out of the camper. It feels strong and durable but lightweight enough to store in my pass-through compartment. I would highly recommend this step.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty step, but easy to pick up and stow away when moving locations. The inside is hollow and I think you could put a sandbag in it to keep it from blowing away in higher winds. I'm a big guy (350+) and this step barely deflects when I step up into my RV.
customer_reviews.author: BigMo

customer_reviews.title: Great steps into the car for my 110 pound dog!
customer_reviews.text: Very light and very sturdy. Easy for me to whip in and out of the car quickly for my big ol' boy to load in and out of the back. Is small enough to move off to the side and still have room for both my big dog and my smaller 30 pound pup. Extremely pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and ligh
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace a flimsy fold out step on our popup trailer. Easy to lift and feels like a quality product. I'm a big guy (300lb) and it feels solid and strong when I stand on it. Think it will be a great addition to our camping.
customer_reviews.author: JNGTexas

customer_reviews.title: Step up
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend likes this step. We used it this past week at a music festival. This step makes it more safe going in and out of the truck camper. Very stable and even after the rain our footing was good going up and down the steps. We are in our 60's so stable is good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Phillip Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holding up great so far. Sure helps not having to step up 10-14 inches at the first step.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Turner

customer_reviews.title: Study, compact.
customer_reviews.text: Genius. Perfect little compact step-up for our dock to sailboat. I have owned this sailboat for 24 years - and now my joints are a little rusty. This cute little step does the job. Worth every penny. Easy to grab with front handle. Light but super sturdy. I weigh 200 lbs - and it supports me well. Highly recommend. My wife loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: They work fine as a dog step
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my 11yo, 110lb Akbash can't jump up into my Honda Ridgeline anymore. These steps are the right height, and they're plenty wide and stable enough for her.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and I have to say that is hollow and I had to full the inside with rocks. I'm hoping it wont fly away with the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Mil

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable and even has a cubby underneath. I use it as a step into my horse trailer rack room and as a mounting block. My horse is over 16hh and it’s a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Had to return only due to it wasn't high enough for my purpose. Was light weight and didn't seem like it would break if you out serious weight on it. Single mold and hollow.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: perfect for what we needed it for. very sturdy and thick plastic. good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as pet stairs!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my elderly foster dog to get in and out of my truck cab. It easily stows in the bed. Very durable but easy to handle. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Russell

customer_reviews.title: Extra step
customer_reviews.text: We wanted steps on the opposite side of our deck but building extra steps was a hassle and a bit expensive. This was the perfect solution. It is sturdy and it is portable.Great purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Faye S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY STURDY AND YET LIGHT ENOUGH FOR ME TT HANDLE, AND I AM 70 YEARS OLD.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our Truck Camper Rear Entrance!
customer_reviews.author: Pop & Nahe Class C Motorhomers

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy steps yet light enough to move.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy steps that I use at entrance to my storage building. Easily portable if you need to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Dabbler

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Needed a step for our camper and this fits perfectly. Seems to be very sturdy but not to heavy for me to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, exactly what I've been looking for quite some ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, exactly what I've been looking for quite some time and after comparison shopping this was the best bargain for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great to help my wife get in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne R Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, slightly pliable depending on where you step, but still very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect on a 12' x 30 ' storage bldg.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Good solid step for our pop up camper.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my handicapped wife to get into our pop up camper. First step has a little give to it but certainly doesn't make it unstable. Otherwise, it is overall a pretty solid entry step.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: That it does work for dogs with arthritis or hip problems leg issues Ect it’s great SAFE
customer_reviews.text: I works great I placed it on the end of my bed the dog climbs up the stairs to my bed no more jumping or getting hurt
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly. Durable and lightweight. My loves them for our camper which has just one step.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: OK step
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an alternative to folding metal steps for our pop up camper. Works fine. Feels a little "soft" when you step on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Use it in my horse trailer when I load saddles in the tack room. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Don Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Steps for my Trailer
customer_reviews.text: This step is Solid, not too heavy and the best and safest stairs I have found for my trailer. You can't go wrong with this well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M Pellerin

customer_reviews.title: Not useful at all.
customer_reviews.text: Hated it. Concaves in the middle of steps. Not useful at all.
customer_reviews.author: bmorg47

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, simple, solid step.
customer_reviews.text: Used to train our Newfoundland pup to get in and out of the MINIVAN. Works fantastic, nice and stable and does not take up as much room as a ramp would. Nice and light but you could use it for a step workout too:) and pup has no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: FullyStrapped

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kids
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well made and in Merica 🇺🇸 This is the one you want! Great for my kids, wife and old dog to get in and out of the RV. The crap one that was attached to it was not working. This is perfect. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect steps for my popup!
customer_reviews.text: This step is just perfect for my popup, just what I was looking for. Cannot wait to use it next summer, it is going to make it so much easier getting in and out of my popup.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille A. Padgett

customer_reviews.title: RV entry step
customer_reviews.text: step wasn't as heavy duty as I expected, I weigh about 250 lb. so I step on the edge Probably break my neck some day
customer_reviews.author: broe

product_meta.title: High Country Plastics Trailer, RV Entry Step, 14" - Ash Gray, Small
product_meta.description: The trailer/RV step has a 14" overall height & wide base designed for easy & stable entry & exit to most trailers. Durably poly constructed light weight design makes this easy to move & take with you on Road trips. Also great for accessing items just out of arms reach. Features a convenient carrying handle & window cut out for storage. Lifetime warranty. Only color available is Ash Gray.
feature_bullets: 14" overall Height and wide base designed for easy and stable entry and exit to most trailers.
Durably poly constructed light weight design makes this easy to move and take with you on Road trips.
Features a convenient carrying handle and window cut out for storage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
